title: Perception structure or flow (TEFC)
creator_credit: Bob Nichol and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Seeing is believing, and believing is seeing, says this film, in an engaging, involving exanimation of what perception is - what causes one person to see things one way, another person in a totally different way. A film to stimulate discussion, especially in the classroom at senior levels.
